page.title: 19Local Charities/Pitreavie.
page.content: Local people are helping sick children in Dunfermline. The Iain Skinner Fund to help 10 year old Iain, who is unable to walk, and the Kara Mitchell Fund to help 2 year old Kara who cannot walk, talk or feed herself. She shows no sign of handicap. Money was raised by sponsoring, discos,raffles and bottles in shops, pubs, clubs and shows. Both children have been to America for major operations and are now doing well. Groups of people who work in the same place often have collections or sponsered events, such as a sponsered slim, swim or run. A lot of people each pay a small amount if you achieve your goal. The Dunfermline half marathon(13miles), which ran partly through our area, was sponsered to support various charities. Gwen Milligan.
